name: moon-flute
effect: Evolves Nebby into Lunala when used at the Altar of the Moone.
short_effect: Evolves Nebby into Lunala when used at the Altar of the Moone.

flavor_text.sun_moon: It is said that the tones it produces were offered up as an expression of gratitude to the Legendary Pokémon of the moon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: It is said that the tones it produces were offered up as an expression of gratitude to the Legendary Pokémon of the moon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: It is said that the tones it produces were offered up as an expression of gratitude to the Legendary Pokémon of the moon.
